Posts.Content: Hi I am sitting in Moffitt cancer center right waiting to see how my wife is doing she is getting 3rd pet scan.  she is on the same meds as you . Her breast Cancer came back after 24 years. It was in her bones everywhere. She had to have emergency surgery. To have her hip replaced. . What I am getting to is the arimidex is what is stopping the cancer. Keep your chin up keep looking forward??
Posts.Title: Arimidex..may not be working

Posts.Content: On Jan 12, 2015 9:50 PM lifesucks wrote: Hi I am sitting in Moffitt cancer center right waiting to see how my wife is doing she is getting 3rd pet scan.  she is on the same meds as you . Her breast Cancer came back after 24 years. It was in her bones everywhere. She had to have emergency surgery. To have her hip replaced. . What I am getting to is the arimidex is what is stopping the cancer. Keep your chin up keep looking forward?? They can tell by tumor markers in your blood to see if it is working . I want to say it took 3-5 weeks to see this. ??
Posts.Title: Arimidex..may not be working
